docs.snippet: TORREMOLINOS, Spain After two rounds of the Costa del Sol International Tournament here in the Cervantes Hotel, six players were tied for the lead with 1 points each. They were Juan Bellon of Spain, Stefano Tatai of Italy, Oscar Castro of Colombia...
docs.lead_paragraph: TORREMOLINOS, Spain After two rounds of the Costa del Sol International Tournament here in the Cervantes Hotel, six players were tied for the lead with 1 points each. They were Juan Bellon of Spain, Stefano Tatai of Italy, Oscar Castro of Colombia, Leon Piasetsky of Canada, Mircea Pavlov of Rumania and myself.

headline.main: Chess:; Costa Del Sol Tournament Gets Off to a Tied-Up Start
